name: Pineapple Halwa Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Pineapple Halwa Recipe: Pineapple tin 1 Semolina 4tbsp Clarified butter Â½ cup Food color (yellow) 2 pinches Milk 1cup Whole dried milk 1 cup almonds, pistachios(Finely cut) as needed Pineapple essence 2 drops Desiccated Coconut as needed
instructions: Drain the pineapple water from the pineapple and crush it in the chopper. In a pan heat the ghee and half fry manioc. Then add and mix 1 cup milk, half cup of water,food color and sugar. When it boils set the flame on medium and cover it. Then add pineapple, coconut powder and 3-4cup of whole dried milk Set the flame on medium and cook it thoroughly. For 5mins simmer it. Set it ona dish and garnish it with the rest of coconut powder and almonds and pistachios.
